# Canonical

This is great.  

+---------------------------------------------------------+
| Metadata                                                |
+================+========================================+
| title          | Home                                   |
+----------------+----------------------------------------+
| canonical      | https://example.com/                   |
+----------------+----------------------------------------+
| og:url         | https://foobar.com/                    |
+----------------+----------------------------------------+
| og:title       | My Home                                |
+----------------+----------------------------------------+
| title:suffix   | ""                                     |
+----------------+----------------------------------------+
